channel.title: [PI] need help adding something to eco item rester
channel.description: hi, i made an eco item reseter that resets and item on everyones account obv... and i wanted to add a code in it that give a player an amount of money, 100m, for having 1 of that item. so if someone has dragon claws the reseter will delete it then give him 100m for it. rite now my reseter will delete the item only. if you need any files just say so.
